title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.8 - Disposal of medication
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.8 - Disposal of medication

State Regulations

Unused youth controlled substance medication shall be
disposed of in compliance with section
80.51
of Title 10
NYCRR. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7310.8

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
